title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image
body: Over the course of the last few weeks i've been virtually unable to play due to an error that is reoccurring. Upon attempting to open the League of Legends client, i receive an error message stating "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020." I've uninstalled the game completely and reinstalled it with some, though little success. It allows me to play, until i log off where upon attempting to open the client i again receive this message. I'm unsure what's causing it and have had to uninstall and reinstall the game multiple times. Please help.

replies.body: I'm having the same exact problem... did you ever find a solution?

Most of the time these bad images mean that some of the game files ended up missing or badly corrupted. Follow the steps in the image I'm linking below and that should get you back in!

https://i.gyazo.com/fbe5976243158ecce7efef172951e219.png

I'm getting the client to pop up now, but now upon clicking launch i'm getting another error (titled the same "LeagueClient.exe Bad Image") but now the file path designated as unable to run is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\league_client\releases\0.0.0.97\deploy\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again using the original installation media or contact your system administrator or the software vendor for support. Error status 0xc0000020. Also another file on the same path, the zlib.dll file is reading the same as the libcurl file.

Strange, that seems like almost the same issue but buried deeper in the game folders. You could try the same solution by deleting the file in the deploy folder, but if you're uncomfortable doing that on your own go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
